attributes.description: This car looks and drives like a new car. We will arrange pre approved finance if need be. This is a one of a kind vehicle, very clean and well maintained. A well looked after vehicle, looks and smells new and drives like a dream. The vehicle is priced better than any other vehicle on Autotrader and Surf 4 Cars. We automatically sent your financial details to all the banks and we assist you in obtaining the best finance deal in the market with pre-approved finance. Extended 1 or 2 year warranties are available on request.Amelda +27 82 321 0455 or Magda 0768329781 Gauteng branch Thanks. Mark Greeff m.greeff@hotmail.com Part of the SA Multi-Franchise Motor Group. Recommendation- we will arrange pre approved finance in need be

attributes.description:
BB Motor Group is a well-established franchise with a wide variety of new & pre-owned vehicles, service departments & parts. As part of a 60-year legacy, we strive to exceed the expectations of all potential & existing customers. To establish & ensure peace of mind, trust and long lasting relationships with our clients, a detailed workshop quality inspection is done on each of our pre-loved vehicles, along with a roadworthy test, full valet & body polish.

Our excellent sales manager, Werner Delport, works closely with his team to ensure competitive offers & excellent service is produced. Request a call back & one of our pre-loved professionals will contact you.

We welcome all trade-ins & deliver nation-wide on request.

#BBWelkom
#ExceedingAllExpectations

A Full and Detailed Workshop Quality Inspection is Done on Each of the vehicles along with a AA Dekra Roadworthy test prior to any Delivery taken. This is to ensure peace of mind for each of our valued customers. For Excellent Service Contact our Sales Manager – Linden Jacobs As part of a 60-year legacy, this fully-fledged automotive dealer group offers New Cars, Used Cars, Parts, and services to all existing and potential customers. With us, you can always expect a little more and once you’re a client, it is hardly a fleeting experience but potentially a life-long partnership.
